title: Missing Bookmark Tool Bar
content: I've just downloaded the new version of firefox & seem to have lost my previous bookmark tool bar. how can I recover it.?

title: can't open Firefox - error message
content:
I can't open Firefox browser. I get an error message, "Error: Platform version '127.0.1 is not compatible with minVersion > = 127.0 maxVersion < = 127.0"

I can only get Google Chrome.

Please advise

title: Firefox for Mac OS freezing when attempting to access gmail
content: When attempting to access gmail on my new (2023) iMac running Sonoma 14.5, Firefox 115.12.0esr freezes and must be force-quit. I've seen similar issues on this and the Apple forum, but not this particular problem. Any suggestions? Thank you.

title: No Video with supported format and MIME type found
content: I am trying to view uploaded videos in to my work portal and when I try to view the video this is the error message I receive. I am running WIndows 10 on my desktop. My Windows is up to date and I have cleared all cookies and still not working. Please help. Thank you
creator: estertravels

title: Cierre esporádico de sesiones en Firefox Nightly
content: Hola a todos, espero que anden bien. Esta es mi primer consulta por lo que espero describirla bien. Tengo Firefox Nightly y me paso unas dos o tres veces que luego de una actualización cierra todas las sesiones y debo iniciar nuevamente una por una, gmail, whatsapp, trello, etc. Por lo que, quería saber si es algo propio de algunas actualizaciones, o si debo cambiar algo en la configuración o que puede ser ya que, son muchas las sesiones a volver a abrir y me pasa en ambas computadoras por lo que se hace eterno volver a la "normalidad" de uso del navegador. Cualquier solución que sepan sería de ayuda. Muchas gracias
creator: imenano89

title: virtual fireworx screen saver
content: I keep getting a page. I need to update firerworx screen saver. It locks the screen untill I fill in my password can I get rid of it. I have never had one.

title: App accesso con CNS non funziona
content: La APP di accesso con Carta Nazionale Servizi a siti della Pubblica Amministrazione non funziona; il messaggio che arriva da questi siti dice "certificato non riconosciuto". Con altri browser si riesce ad accedere (Edge). Grazie, saluti, Giuseppe Rossetti
creator: giusross2023

title: SITO DI ALTROCONSUMO NON FUNZIONA CORRETTAMENTE
content:
Da parecchio tempo succede che quando accedo ai test comparativi sul sito di ALTROCONSUMO la pagina viene ricaricata in continuazione e non termina mai il caricamento. Preciso che ho già provato sia a ripristinare il browser che la modalità provvisoria, ma non ho risolto e che su ad esempio Chrome funziona correttamente.

Resto in attesa di una vostra risposta e saluto cordialmente.

Ilario Ruscasso
creator: i.ruscasso

title: Lose focus on some websites when pressing the Control key
content:
I am using Firefox 127 on Ubuntu.

When I press the Control key, I often lose focus in the window I am currently viewing. This is annoying as it prevents me from copy-pasting for example.

Sometimes the focus is back when I release Control, sometimes it is lost and I have to click again on the text field. It does not happen on all websites, for example support.mozilla.org works well, but it happens on duckduckgo or overleaf.

It does not seem to be the same as existing issues such as ["show mouse when press Ctrl" of Ubuntu] (it is disabled) or an addon (the problem still happens in safe mode).

In case it is useful, when I press Control the tab bar background goes slightly darker, see attached images.

Thanks for your help :) Nicolas
creator: nnadisic

title: Some sort of Windows only bug when using Ren'Py
content: When playing any Ren'Py web build on Firefox Windows, the frames freeze while entering inputs. Depending on what is being displayed on screen, sometimes it will still continue despite the mouse movement, but most things just completely freeze up. Once the inputs stop, the frames will skip ahead to where they should be. This only seems to happen on Windows, as I was told it is not repeatable on Ubuntu using Firefox. This is also not an issue on Chromium based browsers.
creator: madgamer2525

title: Firefox wont stay as default browser
content:
For the last few days Firefox keeps dropping off as the default browser and seems to be defaulting to the Avast Secure Browser thats installed instead.

I keep changing it back via both Firefoxs settings and via Windows default settings but within 10 minutes it falls off again.

How can I make sure Firefox stays as my default browser?
creator: harwoodmatty

title: deleting multiple copies of bookmarks
content: trying to restore previous settings i have accidentally created multiple copy's of bookmarks and folders. many have more than 10 copy's and i now have over 400 000 bookmarks. is there any quick way to delete the copys of bookmarks?
creator: robertpinner

title: Allow us to "lock" picture in picture?
content:
Picture in Picture is an awesome feature and i love that Firefox comes with it by default.

However I do wish for one thing. So we can lock and "click through" the picture in picture, instead of our mice being able to click it by mistake when doing other things (such as grinding on an MMO or something.)

Is there any way to get these options in the near future? It'd be great to play some games when watching a video during slow times! Thank you!
creator: leyzr

title: Goodness
content: goodness
creator: georgehenryjacobs2

title: Bookmark Folders
content: I would like to create bookmark folders WITHIN a bookmark folder. Example: I search the American South, so I have a SOUTH bookmark. But within that bookmark, I would like to have a subfolder for each state. Please help!
creator: johnglavin

title: Location not blocked.
content:
I use Firefox with a VPN. I also use the Chameleon extension to alter my fingerprint. When I log into Messenger.com it asks if this is me and gives my actual, physical location. I've checked in settings under location and it doesn't show any sites requesting my location. I have it open in one of the tabs where it's showing my location. I have block all location requests checked. How can I get Firefox to not show my physical location?

Also on this page, it gives I'm using Firefox and the OS I'm using. Both are supposed to be changed for fingerprinting protection.

This looks like it could be a big security loophole. Any help is appreciated.
creator: 95rhino404

title: Hover cards occassionally stop working
content:
Every so often while browsing, for several FF versions, now, hover card functionality on some sites will simply stop working, even after a complete browser restart. Eventually the cards come back on their own.

Not a crucial issue, frankly, but an annoying one, and I'd like to know why it keeps happening and what can be done to stop it.
creator: damien.williams7

title: The Firefox icon on my Task Bar only opens an ad "Get Firefox for Desktop"  Need access to real start page.
content: I have a full current installation of Firefox, after a struggle to get Bing off my system (Win11) I briefly got back to a personalized start page which had a large text "Firefox" heading and allowed me to add apps in small boxes and click to start an app. That page has disappeared and all I get is the ad referred to in the title. How can I replace the ad with the page I can load with app icons?
creator: Gresch
